text:
<$edit-text tiddler=<<qualify $:/temp/search>> tag="input" default="" placeholder="search"/> <$button 
class="tc-btn-invisible" 
tooltip="cancel search" 
setTitle=<<qualify $:/temp/search>> 
set="!!text" 
setTo="">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</$button>
<$tiddler tiddler=<<qualify $:/temp/search>>>
<$list filter="[!is[system]search:eng,tags,text,title{!!text}]:filter[<..currentTiddler>get[text]minlength[3]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
</$tiddler>
title: Custom search
